file_content.text: My lady has never even met your lord. Why should she agree to marry him?
These are desperate times. We must unite our houses to stand against Organa.
Unite your heir with the eighth of Panteer blood in my lady's veins, you mean.
And I suppose your house has no interest in bearing Alderaan's next king?
House Panteer is dead. House Thul should find its own way to the crown.
